simplesect.para: To use TortoiseSVN, you need a server where your repository is located. This chapter shows you step by step on how you can set up such a server on a Windows machine.

If you don't have a server and/or if you only work alone then you can still use TortoiseSVN and Subversion. The repository is then stored locally on your harddrive. See
about how to set up such a local repository.
